title: How do you check masteries in the replay system?
body:
Mostly looking for key stone masteries.

Also the replay system seems to be bugging out a bit. Crashes for some reason.

replies.body:
At the moment there doesn't seem to be any way to see someone's masteries in replays, but it's always a feature that could be added down the line!

The replay system is still being worked on and improved, but what kind of crashes are you seeing? It might be related to a damaged file, so try running a quick repair through the client options.
Well it didn't do anything but thanks.
